SELECT l.*, IFNULL(u.head,'')`head`, IFNULL(u.user_name,'')username, IFNULL(u.phone,'')phone FROM t_lessee l LEFT JOIN a_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_office o ON o.user_id=l.id LEFT JOIN t_contract c ON c.room=o.id WHERE o.id = #{id} AND DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m' ) =DATE_FORMAT(c.time,'%Y%m')
